inclusion.criterion: age 18 years or older and endorsing either suicidal ideation upon admission or within the last 7 days, or endorsing (or otherwise documented) suicidal behavior within the past 14 days before admission; OR age 18 years or older and undergoing alcohol detoxification
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: presence of a primary psychotic disorder diagnosis on admission
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: major depressive disorder with psychosis, or current hallucinations or ideas of reference, endorsing current psychotic thinking on the Psychosis Screen measure
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: presence of a flag specifying a history of disruptive or violent behavior
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Prisoner (of federal, state, or local authorities)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Currently admitted to 78G under an involuntary commitment
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Interviewer or Hospital staff-suspected or chart-documented presence of mental retardation (IQ <70) or other DSM-IV organic mental disorder
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: acute alcohol or drug intoxication or any delirium
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CLL and large cell transformation, with recent worsening palpable lymphadenopathy. He has undergone multiple treatments without significant response.
